tool_description:
Use this API to validate the email addresses for your business. This endpoint will check syntax and will validate deliverability.

When an email address is valid, an object is returned containing a normalized form of the email address (which you should use!) and other information.
title: Email Checker and Validator

api_list.name: Check Email
api_list.description: Just paste the Email Address you want to validate and wait for the results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-checker-and-validator.p.rapidapi.com/check_email/{email}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-checker-and-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
